title: Training stops
body:
**Your Operating system and DeepLabCut version**

I'm using Windows10, Anaconda3 and DeeplabCut 2.1.1 with GeForce 1060 6GB GPU.

**Describe the problem**
I have used Deeplabcut without any problem with Windows 7 and the prior version of deeplabcut (without GUI dlc) really well. I recently upgraded to Windows 10 and installed the most recent version of deeplabcut. I was impressed by the GUI dlc, but however unexpected problem occurred.
 I use resnet_50 to train my datasets. It is weird that it is much slower than before and it stops at around 100~2000 iteration. GPU engagement is about 10% and after a few hundred iterations suddenly it becomes 0% and freezes. First I wondered it is out of memory situation but the percent of memory used does not exceed 50%. (Memory is 36GB)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13765485/67831432-a4ddc280-fb21-11e9-8e19-fdace25ce1be.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13765485/67832184-233b6400-fb24-11e9-922a-a0cc83debbbb.png)

I know 1060 is not fast, but it worked quite well with the previous version of the deeplabcut!
I tried to go back to the previous version, and I find it really difficult to install the old version of the deeplabcut. 

By the way training works well with mobilenet (using over 70% of the GPU), however, performance is poor compared with resnet in my datasets. Cannot use it :(

Thx in advance!
